heading: 前言
text: 本网站内容用于厦门大学环境与生态学院研究生课程“环境数据分析与可视化”的教学。内容在持续更新中。

heading: 1 R的基础知识
text:
can label chapter section titles using {#label} , e.g., can reference Chapter ??. manually label , automatic labels anyway, e.g., Chapter ??.Figures tables captions placed figure table environments, respectively.
Figure 1.1: nice figure!
Reference figure code chunk label fig: prefix, e.g., see Figure 1.1. Similarly, can reference tables generated knitr::kable(), e.g., see Table 1.1.Table 1.1: nice table!can write citations, . example, using bookdown package (Xie 2022) sample book, built top R Markdown knitr (Xie 2015).
code:
par(mar = c(4, 4, .1, .1))
plot(pressure, type = 'b', pch = 19)
knitr::kable(
  head(iris, 20), caption = 'Here is a nice table!',
  booktabs = TRUE
)

heading: 3 数据整理
text: describe methods chapter.Math can added body using usual syntax like

heading: 3.1 math example
text:
\(p\) unknown expected around 1/3. Standard error approximated\[
SE = \sqrt(\frac{p(1-p)}{n}) \approx \sqrt{\frac{1/3 (1 - 1/3)} {300}} = 0.027
\]can also use math footnotes like this1.approximate standard error 0.0272
